mapper.insert: insert into TABLES (TABLE_CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE) values (#{tableCatalog,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{tableSchema,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into TABLES
TABLE_CATALOG,
TABLE_SCHEMA,
TABLE_NAME,
TABLE_TYPE,
#{tableCatalog,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{tableSchema,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{tableName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into tables (name, object_id, principal_id, schema_id, parent_object_id, type, type_desc, create_date, modify_date, is_ms_shipped, is_published, is_schema_published, lob_data_space_id, filestream_data_space_id, max_column_id_used, lock_on_bulk_load, uses_ansi_nulls, is_replicated, has_replication_filter, is_merge_published, is_sync_tran_subscribed, has_unchecked_assembly_data, text_in_row_limit, large_value_types_out_of_row, is_tracked_by_cdc, lock_escalation, lock_escalation_desc, is_filetable, is_memory_optimized, durability, durability_desc ) values (#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{principalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schemaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentObjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{typeDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isMsShipped,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isPublished,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isSchemaPublished,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lobDataSpaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filestreamDataSpaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxColumnIdUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockOnBulkLoad,jdbcType=BIT}, #{usesAnsiNulls,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isReplicated,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasReplicationFilter,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isMergePublished,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isSyncTranSubscribed,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasUncheckedAssemblyData,jdbcType=BIT}, #{textInRowLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{largeValueTypesOutOfRow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isTrackedByCdc,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lockEscalation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lockEscalationDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{isFiletable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isMemoryOptimized,jdbcType=BIT}, #{durability,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{durabilityDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )
